title: Exploding Fist +  for ZX Spectrum 48/128/+2
creator_credit: Firebird Software, Telecomsoft and Beam Software
material_description: Cassette tape computer game. Cassette and cover in a plastic cassette case.
brief_description: Exploding Fist + [computer game]. Exploding Fist + is a side view beat ‘em up for up to three players. Players fight increasingly tougher opponents to rank as 10th Dan with a wide variety of karate kicks, punches, cartwheels and blocks. Once players have attained the rank of 10th Dan, they must then defend their title against more opponents. Players either score eight points or have the most before the bout ends. Points are scored by striking a fighter. The two highest scoring fighters progress to the next bout. If there is a tie, a replay bout will take place. After every two bouts, surviving players can play a bonus game where they throw ninja stars at demons hiding in a dark alley for additional points.
